title: I plant grapes and Raspberry in pots. Now the winter is coming and soon it will be subzero temperatures. Should I keep watering the pots on a subzero temperature? How should I take care of plants under subzero temperatures? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have left raspberry starts in a 2 gal bucket outside over the winter several times. The bucket just sat in the garden for two years before I got around to planting them. Zone 4, winter temps down to -40° F, and they disappeared under the snow (up to 36″) December to April. They were fine every spring until I planted them (and they still are).
They will go dormit but if the pot freezes it will kill the plant can you bring into a garage or somewhere above freezing
